mapper.insert: insert into t_checkitem(id, code, name, sex, age, price, type, attention, remark) values (#{id}, #{code}, #{name}, #{sex}, #{age}, #{price}, #{type}, #{attention}, #{remark})
mapper.update: update t_checkitem set code = #{code}, name = #{name}, sex = #{sex}, age = #{age}, price = #{price}, type = #{type}, attention = #{attention}, remark =#{remark} where id = #{id}
